title: Cyanide and acetate - base strength based on Keq

content.prompt:
HC2H3O2(aq) + CN-(aq) â‡„ HCN(aq) + C2H3O2-(aq)

The reaction represented above has an equilibrium constant equal to 3.7 x 104. Which of the following can be concluded from this information?

choices.label: The equilibrium constant will increase with an increase in temperature.

skill.text: 1.B: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate both particulate-level and macroscopic- level properties.
